= Getting started =
== Prerequisites ==
To build scxmlcc, you will need:
 * The boost library
 * Basic build tools

On Ubuntu, install these with e.g. apt-get:
{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential libboost-all-dev
}}}
== Optaining And Building scxmlcc ==
scxmlcc is available as compressed releases or directly using SVN. The latest and previous releases is always available at [Download].

To optain scxmlCC using SVN, see the [https://code.google.com/p/scxmlcc/source/checkout Source] tab.

To build scxmlcc, simply execute make:
{{{
cd src
make
}}}
If you also want to build the examples:
{{{
cd examples
make
}}}
== The Examples ==
=== Hello World ===
This is really not a practical state machine. It is just a simple expample for getting started with scxmlcc. This statechart is drawn in [https://code.google.com/p/scxmlgui/ scxmlgui]
http://scxmlcc.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/hello.png
{{{
<scxml initial="hello" version="0.9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml">
 <state id="hello">
  <transition target="world"></transition>
 </state>
 <state id="world"></state>
</scxml>
}}}
